ComicInfo.Penciller: Nick Cardy,Nestor Redondo,Tony DeZuniga,Ralph Reese,Jack Sparling
ComicInfo.Title: Watch Over My Grave!; Death Pulls the Strings; Living Coffin; Come Share My Shroud!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Watch Over My Grave!: While Judy's father is away at his night watchman job, Judy is turned into a witch.
Death Pulls the Strings: A marionette's puppets disobey him and he destroys one and is found hanged by one of his puppets' wires.
Living Coffin: Al Scudder breaks out of solitary but breaks down when he gets in an elevator.
Come Share My Shroud!: Ted has a car accident and meets some ghosts.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
